Source.Name: deno
Source.Summary: A secure JavaScript and TypeScript runtime.
Source.Description: Deno is a simple, modern and secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript that uses V8 and is built in Rust.

Package.Name: deno
Package.Summary: A secure JavaScript and TypeScript runtime.
Package.Description: Deno is a simple, modern and secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript that uses V8 and is built in Rust.
